div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/UsageContext|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 ComplexType `UsageContext` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions. Element `UsageContext` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `UsageContext`.
Element `UsageContext.code` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `UsageContext.code`.

Note that the target element context `UsageContext.value[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `UsageContext`. Element `UsageContext.value[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `UsageContext.value[x]`. Note that the target element context `UsageContext.value[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `UsageContext`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

comment.value: FHIR R5 ComplexType `UsageContext` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions. Element `UsageContext` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `UsageContext`.
Element `UsageContext.code` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `UsageContext.code`.

Note that the target element context `UsageContext.value[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `UsageContext`. Element `UsageContext.value[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `UsageContext.value[x]`. Note that the target element context `UsageContext.value[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `UsageContext`.
